document_data.caption: A map showing the Way of the Dragon and surroundings in Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Way of the Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Way of the Dragon''' was a prominent road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location:
The Way of the Dragon was located in southern Waterdeep. It formed much of the border between the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. The Way of the Dragon originated in the north in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] where it branched south from the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]]. It continued south, turning southwest in a curve near its end to merge with the High Road again at [[Waymoot (Waterdeep)|Waymoot]] just northwest of the [[South Gate]].

Many smaller roads connected with the way of the Dragon including [[Simple's Street]], [[Soothsayer's Way]], [[Drakiir Street]], [[Zastrow Street]], [[Fillet Lane]], [[Net Street (south)|Net Street]], [[Spices Street]], [[Hog Street]], [[Nag Street]], [[Sambril Lane]], [[Slop Street]], [[Brian's Street]], the [[Street of Smiths]], [[Telshambra's Street]], [[Blackhorn Alley]], [[Candle Lane]], [[Hunters' Alley]], [[Manysteps Alley]], [[Odd Street]], and [[Tsarnen Alley]].
